channel.title: How do i make people members
channel.description: how do i make people members in my server? like in the characters thing, wat should the number be?

item.title: How do i make people members
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Oh thats how its set up? That is very inefficient…Well then its probably some where near public void run, something like
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name”)){
isMember = 1;
}

or maybe = true, idk if its a bool or an int and idk the var name so yea, u should be able to figure it out lol…

Read full topic

You have to find it in your client.java, and add the username you want to be member.

item.title: How do i make people members
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Well technically people don’t need to be members, Unless you have it coded that unless they are then they cant do certain things. So being a member and not being a member on private servers doesn’t matter so much.
